Name: zul-iqembulezifundi
Author: Iqembu Lezifundiswa, Mussa Muhammad Telela , Uthman Mfanafuthi Msomi, Moulana Abdur Rahman Chilipa, Haji Ibrahim Mondli Japhet Mthembu, Moulana Imran Ngcobo, Moulana Eshaaq Osman
Source: Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa(IDM), https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Swad, ngeQur’an enesikhumbuzo
Kepha labo abangakholwanga basekuziphazamiseni nasekuphikisaneni
Zingaki izizukulwane esazibhubhisa ngaphambilini kwabo ngakho-ke zakhala kulapho sasingekho isikhathi sokuphunyuka
Futhi bamangale ukuthi bafikelwe ngumxwayisi ophuma phakathi kwabo futhi abangakholwanga bathi, “lona ngumlubi umqambimanga”
Ngakube wenza izithixo uNkulunkulu oyedwa na? ngempela lokhu kuyinto emangalisayo
Futhi abaholi phakathi kwabo basuka bahamba, hambani futhi nibambelele ezithixweni zenu ngempela lokhu kuyinto ehlosiwe
Asikaze sizwe ngalokhu enkolweni yokugcina, lokhu akuyilutho ngaphandle komqambo
Ngakube sehliselwe phezulu kwakhe yini isikhumbuzo phakathi kwethu? Kepha bona basekungabazeni mayelana nesikhumbuzo, kepha abakasizwa isijeziso sami
Noma, ngakube banawo yini amagugu omusa weNkosi yakho ephakeme ngamandla, ephanayo
Nomaokwaboumbusowamazulunomhlabakanyenakokonke okuphakathi kwako kokubili? Ngakho-ke mabakhuphuke ngemizamo (yabo)
Isixuku esiyohlulwa lapho phakathi kwezinhlangano
Abantu baNowa baphika ngaphambilini kwabo kanye no-Ad noFaro
NoThamud nabantu baLothi kanye nezihlali zase-Ayka
Babengenzi lutho ngaphandle kokuphika izithunywa ngakho- ke saqiniseka isijeziso sami
Futhi laba abalindele lutho ngaphandle kokukhala (kwecilongo) okukodwa angeke kube nokulibala
Futhi bathi, “Nkosi yethu sisheshisele ingxenye yethu ngaphambili kosuku lokubala (lokwahlulela)”
Kubekezelele lokho abakushoyo futhi khumbula inceku yethu uDavide onamandla ngempela yena wayephendukela emumva ngokuzisola
Ngempela sazenza izintaba kanye naye ukuthi badumise (uMvelinqangi) kusihlwa nasekuseni
Kanye nezinyoni zaqoqana ndawonye, konke kwakumthobela
Futhi sawuqinisa umbuso wakhe futhi samupha ubuhlakani nokukhuluma
Futhi ngakube sezifikile kuwena izindaba zezitha ngenkathi zingena egunjini lokuthandaza na

Ngenkathi zingena kuDavide ngakho-ke wazesaba zathi, “izimbangi ezimbili ungesabi omunye wethu wone omunye ngakho-ke yehlulela phakathi kwethu ngeqiniso futhi ungabi ngongenabo ubulungiswa futhi siholele endleleni elungile
Ngempela lona ngumfowethu unezimvukazi ezingamashumi ayisishiyagalolunye nesishiyagalolunye mina nginemvukazi eyodwa, wayesethi, “nginike yona” futhi wangehlula ngempela

Wathi (uDavide), “ngempela wenze okungenabo ubulungiswa kuwena ngokufuna imvukazi yakho ezimvukazini zakhe futhi ngempela baningi abahlanganyeli abacindezelana bodwa ngaphandle kwalabo abakholwayo futhi abenza okulungileyo futhi bambalwa labo” futhi uDavide wabona ukuthi simlingile, ngakho-ke wacela intethelelo eNkosini yakhe, wawa phansi wazithoba futhi waphendukela kuMvelinqangi ngokuzisola
Ngakho-ke samthethelela lokho futhi ngempela okwakhe ukusondela kuthina kanye nendawo yokuphindela enhle

Oh Davide! Ngempela thina sakwenza waba ngumholi emhlabeni ngakho-ke yehlulela phakathi kwabantu ngeqiniso futhi ungazilandeli izifiso zizokudukisa endleleni kaMvelinqangi, ngempela labo abadukayo endleleni kaMvelinqangi okwabo yisijeziso esinzima ngenxa yokuthi balikhohlwa usuku lokwahlulela
Futhi asizange siwadale amazulu nomhlaba kanye nako konke okuphakathi kwawo ngaphandle kwenhloso, lokho wabona walabo abangakholwanga ngakho-ke usizi kulabo abangakholelwanga emlilweni
Noma nifisa ukuthi senze labo abakholwayo futhi abenza okuhle okulungileyo njengezoni emhlabeni noma senze abesaba (uMvelinqangi) njengabenzi bokubi na
Yincwadi esayembula kuwena ibusisekile ukuze badlinze ngamavesi ayo futhi ukuze bakhumbule labo abaqondayo
Futhi sanikeza uDavide uSolomoni, inceku enhle kakhulu ngempelayenawayephendukela(kuMvelinqangingokuzisola)
Ngenkathi (amahhashi) ayeveziwe ngaphambili kwakhe kusihlwa aqeqeshwe kahle
Ngakho-ke wathi, “ngempela mina ngithande uthando lobuhle kunenkumbulo yeNkosi yami kwaze kwaba yilapho (ilanga) linyamalala esembozweni (sobumnyama)
(Wathi), “wabuyiseleni kumina” wayeseqala ukuphulula imilenze kanye nezintamo (zamahhashi)
Futhi ngempela samlinga uSolomoni futhi sabeka phezulu kwesihlalo sakhe sobukhosi umzimba wayesephenduka ngokuzisola
Wathi, “Nkosi yami ngithethelele futhi ungiphe ubukhosi obungeke bufanele ngisho noma munye emva kwami, ngempela wena ungophayo”
Ngakho-ke sawenza umoya wamthobela waheleza ngempoqo yakhe noma ngabe yikuphi lapho ewuthumela khona
Nabosathane bonke abakhi kanye nabatshuzi
Kanye nabanye ababoshwe ngamaketango
Lokhu yisipho sethu ngakho-ke yipha noma ugodle ngaphandle kokubala
Futhi ngempela okwakhe ukusondela kuthina futhi indawo enhle yokuphindela
Futhi khumbula inceku yethu u-Ayub (uJobe) ngenkathi ememeza iNkosi yakhe (ethi), “ngempela usathane ungithinte ngenkathazo nangesijeziso
Gxoba ngonyawo lwakho lena yindawo yokugeza ebandayo kanye neyokuphuza
Futhi samnikeza abantu bakhe (nabafana nabo kanye nabo) sabaphinda ngumusa ovela kuthina nesikhumbuzo salabo abaqondayo

Futhi thatha ngesandla sakho isixhawu sotshani bese ushaya ngaso umkakho futhi ungasephuli isethembiso sakho, ngempela samthola engobekezelayo, inceku enhle kakhulu ngempela yena wayengokuphendukayo ngokuzisola
Futhi khumbula izinceku zethu
U-Abrahamu no-Isaka kanye noJakobe bangabantu bamandla kanye nombono
Ngempela thina sabakhetha (ngokubanika) isikhumbuzo sendawo yokuhlala
Futhi ngempela bona kuthina bangabanye babakhethiwe ukwedlula bonke
Futhi khumbula u-Ishmayeli no-Elisha no-Dhul-Kilf, Futhi bonke babengabanye babahle kakhulu
Lesi	yisikhumbuzo,	futhi	ngempela	kwabakholwayo kunendawo enhle yokubuyela
Izivande zangunaphakade amasango azo ayobavulekela
Bacambalale lapho phakathi bayomemeza lapho phakathi (becela) izithelo eziningi kanye nokuphuzwayo
Futhi eduzane kuyobe kunabesifazane abayobe bezithobile ekubhekeni, ontanga ngeminyaka
Lokhu yilokhu enethenjiswa kona kwelanga lokubala
Ngempela lokhu yisabelo sethu esingeke siphele
Lokhu, futhi ngempela kwabenza okubi kunesiphetho esibi sokubuyela
Isihogo bayongena kusona, yimbi leyondawo yokuphumula
Lokhu abakuzwe amanzi abilayo kanye nobovu
Kanye nokunye kohlobo lwako
Leli yiqembu elingena kanye nani, angeke bemukelwe ngempela bona bayongena emlilweni
Bayothi, “Chabo! Nina anemukelwe, nina nakuletha kuthina yimbi indawo yokuhlala”
Futhi bayothi, “Nkosi yethu lowo owaletha lokhu kuthina ngakho-ke mnezelele ngesijeziso esiphindwe kabili emlilweni”
Futhi bayothi, “kungani singawaboni amadoda (abantu) esasibabala phakathi kwabalungileyo
Ngakube sibathathe njengenhlekisa noma amehlo akakwazi ukubabona
Ngempela lelo yiqiniso – ingxabano nokuphikisana kwabantu bomlilo
Ithi,“kuphelaminangingumxwayisifuthiakekhouNkulunkulu ekufanele akhonzwe ngaphandle kukaMvelinqangi oyedwa umnqobi”
INkosi yamazulu nomhlaba kanye nako konke okuphakathi kwako kokubili iphakeme ngamandla, iyathethelela
Ithi, “loko kuyizindaba ezinkulu”
Nina enizifulathelayo
Anginalo ulwazi ngabaholi (izinduna) eziphakeme ngenkathi ziphikisana
Akwembulwanga lutho kumina ngaphandle kokuthi mina ngingumxwayisi ogqamile kuphela
Khumbula ngenkathi iNkosi yakho ithi ezingelosini, “ngempela mina ngingumdali womuntu ngobumba”
Ngakho-ke kwathi lapho sengimenzile ngamphefumulela ngomoya wami nabe seniwa phansi najabalala ngaphambili kwakhe
Ngakho-ke izingelosi zaguqa ngokuzithoba zonke ndawonye
Ngaphandle kuka-Iblis waqhosha futhi wabangomunye wabangakholwa
Wathi (uMvelinqangi), “Oh Iblis! Yini ekuvimbelayo ukuthi uthobele lowo engimdale ngezandla zami zombili na? Ngakube uziphakamisile noma ubengomunye walabo abaphakeme na
Wathi (u-Iblis) mina ngingcono kunaye ungidale ngomlilo wabe sewumdala ngobumba
Wathi (uMvelinqangi) ngakho-ke phuma kulona (izulu) ngempela wena ungogxoshiweyo
Futhi ngempela siphezu kwakho isiqalekiso sami kuze kube usuku lokwehlulela
Wathi (u-Iblis), “Nkosi yami nginike ithuba kuze kube usuku abayovuswa ngalo
(UMvelinqangi) wathi ngakho-ke ngempela wena ungomunye wabanikwe ithuba
Kuze kube wusuku lwesikhathi esaziwayo
Wathi, “ngakho-ke ngokuhlonipheka kwakho ngempela ngizobadukisa bonke”
Ngaphandle kwezinceku zakho ezikhethiwe phakathi kwabo
Wathi, “yiqiniso futhi yiqiniso engilishoyo”
Ngempela ngizogcwalisa isihogo ngawe kanye nangabobonke abakulandelayo phakathi kwabo
Ithi anginiceli umvuzo ngako futhi mina angiyena omunye wabakhohlisi
Akuyilutho ngaphandle kwesikhumbuzo emihlabeni. 89. Futhi ngempela nizozazi izindaba zaso emva kwesikhashana
